lines.text: This is where you should be. Here... with us.
It can only be the way I say it must be.
I have been led here, I have work to do. But what?
They say they love us, but I could kill them for what they have done to you.
This man may be a genius, but you ought to know... he's a fraud.
It isn't me that's discredited, it's any new ideas... you might as well kill them!
Your dreams of blood... have brought about this horrible reality. Emil is the instrument of your lust.
"Blood will have blood," they say. Well, there must be no more blood on our souls.
The world will be a better place without me, and it won't even know that you died.
